doc:
Željko Ivanek https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C5%BDeljko_Ivanek 0 Željko Ivanek (né Šimić-Ivanek; ; Slovene: [ˈʒɛːlkɔ iˈʋaːnək]; born August 15, 1957) is a Slovenian-American actor, known for his role as Ray Fiske on Damages, for which he won the Primetime Emmy Award. Ivanek is also known for his role of Ed Danvers on Homicide: Life on the Street and Homicide: The Movie, Governor James Devlin on Oz, Andre Drazen on 24, Blake Sterling on the short-lived NBC series The Event, and Emile "The Hunter" Danko on Heroes. Since 2014, he has starred as Russell Jackson in the CBS drama Madam Secretary. Željko_Ivanek ( né_Šimić-Ivanek ; ; Slovene : [_ˈʒɛːlkɔ_iˈʋaːnək_] ; born August_15_,_1957 ) is a_Slovenian-American_actor , known for his_role as Ray_Fiske on Damages , for which he won the_Primetime_Emmy_Award . Ivanek is_also_known for his_role of Ed_Danvers on Homicide : Life on the_Street_and_Homicide : The_Movie , Governor_James_Devlin on Oz , Andre_Drazen on 24 , Blake_Sterling on the_short-lived_NBC_series The_Event , and Emile " The_Hunter_"_Danko on Heroes . Since 2014 , he has_starred as Russell_Jackson in the_CBS_drama_Madam_Secretary .
